body:
Hi Omid Rashidi,



I checked your solution again, It seem there is an other problem, if the setting of "ShadeType_" of "Honeybee_EnergyPlus Window Shade Generator" is "1", the display is correct, but if the setting of "ShadeType_" is "0",  and change the direction of  window and single wall(bypass the "Flip" component), the position of shade can not be changed accordingly. it seems it is a bug.



Solon
